description: SRE have noticed that the core configuration of your cluster has been modified by a user leveraging cluster-admin permissions. The cluster cannot be restored to a managed state; please delete the cluster by following the documentation guidelines: https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_openshift_service_on_aws/4/html/install_rosa_classic_clusters/rosa-sts-deleting-cluster#. Please open a support case if you need any assistance.
